name: An Excellent Friendship
description:
May 13, 1987

11 ships carrying convicts and cargo leave Portsmouth, England to travel to Botany Bay,  Australia to found a Penal colony.

You play as Edmund, one of the convicts that formed a friendship with a man named William on a boat called Friendship.

The conditions on the boat are horrible and Ed and Will are slowly starving to death. Ed takes it upon himself to sneak out of his cell and find food for both him and Will.

My entry to the Historically accurate game jam 5.

NOTE - If the web version seems to not work, please try the downloadable version.
